basics.name: Nahuel Gil
basics.label: Full-Stack developer with more than 6 years of experience
basics.summary: I am an Analyst-Programmer graduated at ORT University. I consider myself an enterprising person with ease to learn, to carry out  tasks. My goal is  to  cultivate and maximize my skills within and outside the Company,how to take advantage of the study and thus progress as a developer

work.name: woOw
work.summary: My first work experience in the world of programming.Where I developed in the Backend area with PHP andMySQL technologies. My role was to work on different tasks from our PO.

work.name: Altimetrik
work.summary: Second work experience where I my change orientation. I went from Backend to Frontend. I started to gain more experience in JavaScript and related frameworks. My role together with my team was to develop and implement solutions in different projects.
highlights: Jump from JR to mid level

work.name: TaTa S.A
work.summary: Responsible for the programming,development and implementation of new projects. I started with a Fullstack role oriented to Backend where at 6 months I joined the Frontend team to work exclusively on it.
highlights: I strengthened my skills with Angular

work.name: Dualboot
work.summary: At Dual-boot, I learned to work in a big software factory where each project was a challenge, from which I gained substantial knowledge. During this phase, I had the opportunity to lead projects as the sole front-end developer, which was an enriching challenge. Furthermore, it allowed me to continue improving my skills with Angular.
highlights: Learned to work in a large software factory

work.name: Vangwe
work.summary: At Vangwe, I am part of a team that is responsible for the development of a platform that connects professionals with companies. I am in charge of the Frontend area, where I work with Angular and Tailwind. I also work with the Backend team, where I use Nest JS and Mongo

projects.name: Plus Fit
projects.description: Gym App is an application designed for small gyms with the purpose of providing a platform where users' routines can be displayed on screen. These routines will dynamically change depending on the time the user visits the gym.

projects.name: Salud Connect
projects.description: Salud Connect is an application designed to assist both professionals and users in establishing connections. It offers a system where professionals from various health sectors can store information about their services and provides a real-time calendar (virtual agenda) to support the professional, among many other functionalities

projects.name: DTF Central
projects.description: At DTF Central, I worked as a Fullstack Developer in a freelance capacity, leading technical projects from conception to completion. My responsibilities included both frontend and backend development, ensuring seamless integration and functionality across platforms. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions and played a key role in guiding the technical direction of the projects.

projects.name: Workwisse
projects.description: A platform that provides verified, anonymous employee reviews to help job seekers make informed career decisions. It offers insights into company culture, salaries, and growth opportunities, promoting transparency in the workplace.

projects.name: Workwisse
projects.description: A platform that provides verified, anonymous employee reviews to help job seekers make informed career decisions. It offers insights into company culture, salaries, and growth opportunities, promoting transparency in the workplace.

projects.name: Rentalomio
projects.description: A multi-tenant e-commerce platform for rental businesses. It provides a customizable storefront for companies to manage their product inventory, bookings, and process payments.
highlights: Developed a multi-tenant architecture to support multiple businesses.
Implemented a booking and inventory management system.
Integrated payment gateways to process online payments.
